title: How to Attract and Retain Top Talent in a Tight Market
description: One reason why the big advisory firms keep getting bigger is they do a better job of creating a culture that attracts and retains top talent. Gartner's Brian Kropp shows how.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: One reason why the big advisory firms keep getting bigger is they do a better job of creating a culture that attracts and retains top talent. Gartner's Brian Kropp shows how.
